title: As a user I want to create a new Registration Profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in with Admin permissions for Registration Profile
AND user navigates to International tab
custom_steps: WHEN user click on "Create New" on International dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN System will load Create New Player form.
AND user will see the "Register" button is disabled until all of the required fields have been entered. 
AND The National ID fields are conditionally required based on the selection of "Birth Country", and this should be reflected via the red asterisks displayed on the UI. 
AND Entering the required fields on the Create New form, including a DOB on or after 9/1/1995 will take the user to a new registration profile, per the data discovery and wireframe. 
AND There are a lot of conditionally displayed fields on these profiles, so the data discovery should be paid special attention. 
AND The Registration Reviews and Means of Contact sections are not visible on create. 
AND Any action buttons and calculated fields (Eligible to Sign date/Meets Age Requirements) are handled in follow up stories.

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=89347752

Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=registration
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=master

title: As a user I want to save a new Registration Profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in with Admin permissions for Registration Profile
AND User is in the create new player form
custom_steps: WHEN user click "Save" on the new Registration profile form
custom_expected:
THEN The system runs a required field and formatting check per the provided data discovery, saves the profile and a blue successful save notification is thrown. 
AND Fields are conditionally required, especially upload labels, so the data discovery should be paid special attention. 
AND The Registration status should be set to "Pending BOC Review" on save.
OR If the user Clicking "Cancel" will prompt the user to confirm that they wish to cancel. If they confirm, the user is returned to the point of entry and no profile is stored. If they do not confirm, they are returned to the profile in edit mode. 


Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=89347752

Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=master

title: As a Club user I want to view an existing Registration profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN club user is logged in with Viewer Permissions for existing Registration Profile
custom_steps: WHEN user opens an existing Registration Profile
custom_expected:
THEN the system will display per the Data Discovery and provided wireframe. 

*Note that registration profiles are international amateurs with a DOB on or after 9/1/1995*

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=89347752

Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=master

title: International Player Profile Permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with either editors or viewers permission AND the new International LDAP role
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to do anything with an international amateur profile
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to see and use the following: 
 - International Amateurs2 Quick Search
 - International Amateurs2 Advanced Search
 - Load the new International Amateur profiles
AND users with edit permissions see the "New Player" tab under International
BUT users without international amateur edit permissions should not see this tab
AND users with edit permissions should be able to create new, save new and edit/save existing international amateur profiles (both registration and grandfathered)
AND both of these roles are granted to both BOC and Club users. 
AND BOC Users with L2 Editors permission should be able to edit the L2 Possibility checkbox 
BUT BOC users without this permission should be unable to edit this checkbox
AND users outside the BOC should continue to not see the checkbox at all
AND BOC users with the deleters permission should see the Delete button on international amateur profiles (where applicable)
BUT users without this permission should not see this button

Existing LDAPs:
EBIS-INTL-PLAYER-EDITORS 
EBIS-INTL-PLAYER-VIEWERS
EBIS-INTL-L2-EDITORS
EBIS-INTL-PLAYER-DELETERS

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to create a new Trainer/Agent while editing a registration profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC user logged in with create permissions for Registration profile and Trainer/Agent profile
AND user is in edit mode on a registration profile as a BOC user
AND user navigated to a "New Trainer/Agent" hyperlink in the Trainer/Agent section of the profile
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on "New Trainer/Agent" link (Club users do not see this hyperlink)
custom_expected:
THEN the system will open a new trainer/agent form in a new tab/window for the user to complete the profile. 
AND Clicking "Save" on the new trainer/agent form will store the trainer/agent profile as an Approved profile, just as though it were created through the normal "Create New" workflow. 
AND After the new trainer/agent has been saved - it should be prepopulated in the "Name" field of the registration profile.

Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=create_new_trainer_agent_v1

title: As a user I want to be able to edit an existing trainer/agent profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in with edit permissions for trainer/agent profiles 
AND user navigates to L1 Reg tab under International
AND user select a trainer/agent from the widget and opens the trainer/agent profile in view mode
custom_steps: WHEN use clicks "Edit" button on the Trainer/Agent widget
custom_expected:
THEN system will loads the trainer/agent profile in edit mode, per the wire and data discovery. 
AND When on the trainer/agent form in edit mode there is a save button and a cancel button available. 
AND Clicking "Cancel" will prompt the user to confirm that they are OK losing their changes. If they confirm, the system will discard the profile and return the user to the point of entry. If they do not confirm, they are returned to the profile in edit mode. 
AND Clicking "Save" will run a required field and format check for the profile and save the profile. 
AND Any updates made to the trainer/agent profile will be reflected in the Trainer/Agent widget as well as on the relevant International Amateur profiles.

Wireframe: 
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=trainer_agent_profile

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=89347878

title: As a user I want to be able to view a list of all available trainer/agent profiles
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with Viewer permissions for a list of all available trainer/agent profiles
custom_steps: WHEN user click on the "International" tab
custom_expected:
THEN user should see L1 Reg tab as the default landing tab
AND user should see Trainer/Agents widget available
AND The widget matches the provided data discovery and wireframe.
AND It is populated with the database of available Approved trainer/agents.

Wireframe: 
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=trainer_agent_widget

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=89347879

Acceptance Criteria:

title: As a user I want to be able to quickly find an International Amateur Player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user logged in with quick search permissions for International Amateur Player
AND user wants to find an International Amateur Player quickly
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects "International Amateur Players2" from quick search dropdown
AND types in three characters
custom_expected:
THEN search results are displayed in dropdown
AND  the delivery of this story should not impact the existing "International Amateurs" quicksearch - that will be 'turned off' at a later date.
AND This quicksearch should return players according to the population rules above.
AND Visibility rules will be handled in a follow up story.

Quicksearch Population: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Quick+Search+Population+rules

title: As a user I want to be able to use advanced search for International Amateur Players
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user logged in with Advance Search permissions for International Amateur Player
AND user is on the advance search page
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects "International Amateur Player2" from the 'search for' dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN The delivery of this story should not impact the existing "International Amateur"  advanced search - that will be 'turned off' at a later date.
AND This advanced search should have the filters available per the requirements document.
AND The available columns should match the requirements document.

title: As a BOC user I want to see the Reg Admin widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN BOC user is logged in with Viewer Permissions for Ref Admin Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user click "L1 Reg" tab under International
custom_expected:
THEN The Registration Admin widget is the first widget for BOC users on that tab. 
AND The Registration Admin widget matches the provided wireframe and data discovery. 
AND The population of the Registration Admin widget is any player profile that has an Eligible to Sign Date within the selected Eligible to Sign date range. 
AND The default eligible to sign date range is the upcoming signing period (ex: Now it would be 7/2/2018 - 8/31/2018). 
AND The default status is "All Registered" (excludes profiles with a status of "registered"). 
AND When a player converts to a professional player - they should no longer display on this widget. 
AND Browser tab text = "L1 Reg"

Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=registration_admin

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Registration+Admin+Widget+-+Data+Discovery

title: As a Club user I want to see the Club Registration List widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN  club user is logged in with Viewer Permissions for Club Registration List Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user click "L1 Reg" tab under International
custom_expected:
THEN The Club Registration list widget is the first widget for the Club users on that tab. 
AND The Club Registration list widget matches the provided wireframe and data discovery. 
AND The population of the Club Registration List widget is any player that the viewing Club has registered for the selected Eligible to Sign date range OR has added to their Club Registration List. 
AND The default Eligible to Sign date range is the upcoming Signing Period (ex: right now that would be 7/2/2018 - 8/31/2018).
AND The default of the "statuses" filter is All. 
AND Browser tab text = "L1 Reg"

*Spreadsheet upload covered in separate stories* 
*Widget filters covered in another story*

Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=club_registration_list

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Club+Registration+List+Widget+-+Data+Discovery

title: As a user I want to be able to run the All Registered Players List Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN BOC or Club user logs in
custom_steps: WHEN user is in reporting widget
custom_expected:
THEN "All Registered Players" will appear on the Report listing widget. Selecting this report from the widget will launch the prompts according to the requirements. 
AND The category of this report should be "International". 
AND The current year should always be available for the BOC.
AND The current year should ONLY be available for anyone outside of the BOC after the Open All Registration Report system date for the current year. 
AND Entering the desired prompts and running the report will work and match the requirements. 
AND The report will continue to use the existing LDAP. 
AND The report will NOT be downloadable to any format other than pdf.
AND The report will include a watermark on each page of the running user's username.

Report Layout: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/All+Registered+Players+-+Report+Layout

Report Details: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/All+Registered+Players+-+Report+Details

Report Logic: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/All+Registered+Players+-+Population%2C+Logic+and+Sort+Considerations

Report Prompts: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/All+Registered+Players+-+Prompts

Report Security: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/All+Registered+Players+-+Audience+-+Security-+Frequency

title: As a BOC user I want fake players included in the All Registered Players List Report
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC user logs in
AND user is in reporting widget
AND selected "All Registered Players List Report"
custom_steps: WHEN user run "All Registered Players" report
custom_expected:
THEN Each run of the All Registered Players report will include 3 fake players. 
AND The 3 players' names and year of birth are updated each year, and the prior year's values will need to be maintained so that running the report for prior years will still use the correct values. 
AND Running the report will always include the fake players, but their DOB will adjust based on the Org of the user running the report. For this reason, their DOB's need to fall in months with 31 Days. 
AND Running as ARI would be May 1, 2002 and running as BAL would be May 2, 2002, etc.

title: As a BOC user I want to indicate which players should have the # next to their name for the current year
custom_preconds: GIVEN BOC user logs in
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user updated # next to player name to denote that they are a Cuban born player and subject to additional requirements.
custom_expected: THEN We need a way for these players to be set on the backend or front end and have that pulled into the report.

title: As a user I want running the All Registered Players List Report to download a pdf
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user logs with permission to print reports
AND the user is in Reporting widget
custom_steps: WHEN user selects the report from the widget
custom_expected:
THEN system will launch the prompts according to the requirements. 
AND Entering the desired prompts and running the report will download a pdf of the selected report to the user's computer.

title: As a user I want to be able to run the All Registered Players List Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN Club and BOC logs in with Reporting permission
custom_steps: WHEN user is in Report Widget
custom_expected:
THEN "All Registered Players" Report should be listed on reporting widget. 
AND Selecting this report from the widget will launch the prompts according to the requirements. 
AND The category of this report should be "International". 
AND The current year should always be available for the BOC.
AND The current year should ONLY be available for anyone outside of the BOC after the Open All Registration Report system date for the current year. 
AND Entering the desired prompts and running the report will work and match the requirements. 
AND The report will continue to use the existing LDAP. 
AND The report will NOT be downloadable to any format other than pdf.
AND The report will include a watermark on each page of the running user's username. 
AND Players who have been indicating as needing a # next to their names, have it. 
AND Running the report includes the designated fake players, with their DOB adjusting based on the Org of the user running the report.

Report Layout:

Report Details:

title: As a Club user I want to be able to Request an Investigation for an International Amateur player
custom_preconds: GIVEN club user is logged in with Edit permissions for Investigations
custom_steps: WHEN user opens International Amateur player profile in view mode
custom_expected:
THEN Users with Edit permissions for Investigations see a Create New icon on International Amateur profiles.
AND Club users are able to launch a new Investigation Request for the player via the Create New. 
AND The Investigation Request workflow is able to be completed for the new kind of International Amateur profiles, just like it was previously. 
AND This needs to still work for existing international amateurs.

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to create an Investigation for an International Amateur player
custom_preconds: GIVEN BOC user logs in with edit permission for Investigations
custom_steps: WHEN user opens International Amateur profiles
custom_expected:
THEN Users with Edit permissions for Investigations see a Create New icon on International Amateur profiles.
AND BOC users are able to launch a new Investigation for the player via the Create New. 
AND The Investigation workflow is able to be completed for the new kind of International Amateur profiles, just like it was previously. 
AND Creating and saving an investigation in ebis should send all relevant player information to LARI AID, along with the created Investigation. 
( See stories #139253905 and #140608327)
AND This needs to still work for existing international amateurs.

title: As a user I want updating an international amateur profile with an investigation to send the update to LARI
custom_preconds: GIVEN an International Player Profile has already been sent to LARI
custom_steps: WHEN the International Player Profile associated with a player ID a that has already been sent to LARI is updated
custom_expected:
THEN the information should be communicated to LARI 
AND saving changes to an International amateur profile that has an investigation associated with it should send those updates to LARI.

title: As a user I want to be able to create a NES List transaction for an international amateur player
custom_preconds: GIVEN BOC or club user is logged in with Edit permissions for MN Transactions
custom_steps: WHEN user opens International amateur player profiles
custom_expected:
THEN Users with Edit permissions for MN Transactions see a Create New icon on International Amateur profiles.
AND BOC users are able to launch a new Place on NES List for the player via the Create New. 
AND The Place on NES List transaction should work for the new version of international amateurs just as it does for the old version.

title: As a user I want Terms Accepting the MNC of an International Amateur player to convert the player into a professional player profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC user is logged in with edit permissions for MNC
AND user is viewing MNC of an International Amateur player 
AND the MNC status is in Terms Submitted
custom_steps: WHEN user click on "Update Status" from Terms Submitted to Terms Accepted
custom_expected:
THEN the international player profile should be converted to a Professional profile. 
AND All of the relevant information should be carried forward from the amateur to the professional profile.
AND The MLB Program Participation and other portions of the "International" tab should be appropriately populated, in addition to the Info tab. 
AND The player should no longer be visible in International Amateur searches and widgets. 
AND This needs to still work for existing international amateurs.

title: As a user I want to be able to create a MJ Contract for an International Amateur player
custom_preconds: GIVEN user logs in with MJC Admin permissions
custom_steps: WHEN user is viewing an International Amateur Profile
custom_expected:
THEN Users with Edit permissions for MJ Contracts see a Create New icon on International Amateur profiles.
AND Users are able to launch a new MJ Contract for the player via the Create New. 
AND The MJ Contract should work for the new version of international amateurs just as it does for the old version, including the conversion to a professional player profile at the appropriate point.

title: As a user I want to be able to create a MN Contract for an International Amateur player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN club user is logged in with Edit International Amateur permissions
AND user is viewing International Amateur Player profiles
custom_steps: WHEN user click on "Create New icon" on International Amateur profiles
custom_expected:
THEN Users are able to launch a new Minor Contract for the player via the Create New. 
AND The Minor Contract workflow is able to be completed for the new kind of International Amateur profiles, just like it was previously. This includes the information properly populating the printed MN Contract, and the contract showing up in the International Signing Bonus utility if applicable. 
AND This needs to still work for existing international amateurs. 

*Amateur conversion to professional is covered in another story*

title: As a club, I want to be stopped from trading an Intl pool amount that is not an increment of 250k
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is logged in as Club/BOC
custom_steps:
WHEN User goes to a minor roster widget
AND Selects create new on an active player
AND Selects an outright(trade)
AND Adds an organization
AND Adds a International Signing Bonus Consideration
AND Adds a value that is NOT 250k or the total remaining signing bonus amount
AND Clicks Submit
custom_expected:
THEN User receives an error that says "International Signing Bonus Pool amount must be an increment of $250,000 or must be equal to the remainder of the amount in your Signing Bonus Pool"

- Additionally, turn off rule 2.23 #131318821 once the new signing period begins. It should continue to function properly until the end of the 2016-2017 period.

title: As a club, I want to see a list of my International First Year Contracts that fall within a Signing Period
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is logged in as BOC/Club
custom_steps:
WHEN User goes to minor contracts dashboard
AND Clicks on International Signing Bonuses
custom_expected:
THEN Show a list of all international 1st year contracts that have a signing bonus,dual sport, or mexican assignment agreement clause with a signing date that falls within the intl signing period for club
AND only show contracts in the following states:Terms Accepted, Update Terms Accepted, Pre-approved, Approved, Pending Investigation, Expired, Terminated
AND The international signing bonus years corresponds to the international signing period date
AND shows the player name (last, first) , signing date, and home country of the player
AND player should be linked to player profile
AND Signing date should be linked to contract
AND on the footer show the total number of contracts

title: As a club, I want all signing bonuses under 10k to be excluded from Intl SB
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User is logged in as Club
AND Has created a international 1st year minor contract with a signing bonus less than 10k
AND Is on the international signing bonus screen
custom_steps:
WHEN User finds added signing bonus screen
AND Finds minor contract that user had previously inputted
custom_expected:
THEN Row appears green
AND Exception Type column shows "Less than or equal to $10,000"
AND footer shows sum of all exceptions
AND footer shows value of total signing bonuses minus exceptions

title: As BOC, I want to see intl 1st yr Contracts and their signing bonuses for all Clubs
custom_preconds:
1. GIVEN logged in as BOC

2. GIVEN logged in as a club
custom_steps:

    AND BOC can toggle to any Club
    AND BOC can edit the Comments column when form is in EDIT mode.

    AND club can toggle to any Club

    AND comment bubble should only show in view mode if there is a comment. It should follow global styling

title: As a club, I want to be stopped from trading a pool amount that I don't have
custom_preconds:
GIVEN logged in as a club
AND in the 2017 International Signing Period
custom_steps:
WHEN trading an International Pool Amount that is greater than the club's remaining pool available
AND user clicks Submit
custom_expected:
THEN Rule must be run OnSubmit on Trades for all applicable state changes (Business rule #2.242: The amount entered by the club for an Intl SB pool consideration must not be higher than the current Signing bonus pool of the club.)

AND be hard error for club (override for BOC)
AND rule must only be in effect beginning the 2017 signing period
AND Error message says "Amount entered for the International Signing Bonus Pool consideration is higher than the current Signing Bonus pool of [From Org name]"

title: As a club, I want to see total value of Signing Bonuses of my Intl contracts
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in as a club
custom_steps: WHEN viewing the International Signing Bonus utility
custom_expected:
THEN for each contract in the Intl SB utility, show the Bonus Amount in the contract
AND Order from highest to lowest values. 
AND for most players, the total value amount listed in their Signing Bonus Clause or Dual Sport Bonus clause in Addendum B of their Contract is their Actual Signing Bonus for the purposes of this widget.)
AND for players who have a Mexican Assignment Agreement section on their contract, their Actual Signing Bonus is taken from the field "Portion of fee retained by player" 
AND for players who have both - a Signing Bonus/Dual sport bonus clause AND a Mexican assignment agreement, their Actual Signing Bonus for the purposes of this widget is the sum of the amounts in both sections.
AND large numbers should be formatted with commas
AND on the footer, show the total value of all Signing bonuses
AND the table is default sorted on the "Actual Signing Bonus" value column from highest to lowest

**Wire**
http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=future

title: As a club, I want to be stopped from increasing my Signing Bonus pool by more than a set percent of my original pool
custom_preconds:
GIVEN logged in as a club
AND BOC users have set the new system value under the section of System values called "International Signing Bonus Pool Max. Increase %"
custom_steps: WHEN a club is trading an International Signing Bonus Pool amount
custom_expected:
THEN Business rule #2.243 must be run OnSubmit on Trades for all applicable state changes
AND is a hard error for club, override for BOC
AND Rule must only be in effect beginning the 2017 signing period
AND Error message states "[To Org] may not exceed [system value]% of its original pool value. Original Pool Value for [To Org]: $[Amount], Maximum Pool Value for [To Org]: $[Amount]"
AND additionally show the value of the club's Maximum Allowable Pool on the International Signing Bonus Utility screen

Rule:  A club may not increase its SB pool by more than a certain per cent of their original pool. This per cent value is set in the System Values for each Signing period. 
- For example, the value set for year 2017 will apply to the 2017 to 2018 signing period. The To Org may not acquire an International SB pool amount through a Trade that will cause them to exceed their Maximum pool value. For example, if DET has an original pool value of $1m, and the max % increase is 50%, then DET cannot receive more than $500,000 in pool amount. IF DET is already at 1.5m, then this rule must fire.

Wire: http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=future

title: As a club, I want to increase my Intl pool through a trade
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in as a club or BOC
custom_steps: WHEN on the Trade screen
custom_expected:
THEN the International Signing Bonus Pool consideration should only have the "To" field and a free type Amount field
AND there is no Add row option
AND the Consideration name is now International Signing Bonus Pool
AND these changes should only be in effect beginning the 2017 Signing period
AND once the Trade is approved, the "To" clubs SB pool is increased by the traded value. (The SB pool breakdown shows an additional row eg. "Acquired from NYY  $500,000")
AND the "From" Club's SB pool is reduced by the equivalent amount. (The SB pool breakdown shows "Traded to COL -$500,000")
AND any pool changes resulting from a trade do not count toward the "Original Pool"
AND the Assignment Agreement should be updated to show "Amount" instead of a slot value in the INTL SB pool section
AND if this is a 3 way trade, then the club can add another row but they should not be allowed to pick the same To Org in multiple rows. (The Add Row button is only enabled when there are more than 2 Orgs involved in the trade)

Trade - http://t4lvuq.axshare.com/#p=intl_signing_bonus_slot

**Wire**
http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=future

AND Clicks Save

AND Clicks Edit

http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=future

1.THEN Exception type column becomes an editable field
AND The dropdown displays the following options: 1. Less than or equal to 2. Foreign Professional 3. Other (Contact BOC)
AND The row with the exception turns green once saved

2.THEN Exceptions field is uneditable for club.

title: As a club, I want to see my Signing Bonus Pool value
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in as a club or BOC
custom_steps: WHEN viewing the International Signing Bonus utility
custom_expected:
THEN all clubs receive a base Signing Bonus Pool Value of $4,750,000.
AND this amount should display in the header as shown in the wireframe for Club and BOC
AND Club and BOC can also see the current total Signing Bonuses (excluding exceptions) in the header
AND the Base pool value should be a system value that can be entered in the System values screen
AND clubs can also the remaining pool amount in the header which is the Current pool minus the Actual total Signing bonuses

**Wire**

title: As a club/BOC , I can export the Utility to Excel

title: As a club, I want my pool amount to be decreased during a trade if I will reach my maximum allowable pool
custom_steps:
**AC**
- Business rule #2.2411 (This rule is similar to a pre-cba rule 2.24 #131318845)
-	Override for BOC and Club
-	Rule must only be in effect beginning the 2017 signing period
If International Signing Bonus pool is being traded

Then calculate if the receiving club will exceed it's "Maximum Allowable Pool" by acquiring the traded pool amount. If it will exceed, then show error and reduce the traded pool amount received by the To Club so that the To Club will be exactly at it's Maximum allowable pool. The "From" Club will still lose the full value of traded amount.

For example, if Club A is giving Club B 250K, and Club B has a maximum allowable Pool increase value of 7.1m and a current total SB value of 6.9m, then the traded pool amount is reduced to 200k. Club B now increases it's pool by 200k, but Club A still loses 250K.

Error Message: The value of the international signing pool amount being traded [traded amount] will be adjusted to [new amount] since [acquiring Org] will otherwise exceed its Maximum Allowable Pool.

- Additionally, turn off rule 2.24 #131318845 once the new signing period begins. It should continue to function properly until the end of the 2016-2017 period.

title: As a Club, I want to be stopped if I submit an international 1st yr contract during the Intl Signing Closed Period
custom_steps: **AC**- Bus Rule 5.59- Applies only to International 1st yr contracts- Hard error for Club, override for BOC in all applicable state changesRule:If Contract has a Signing Date that falls on or between the International Signing Closed period (System Dates) show hard error for Club and Override for BOCError:Contract may not be submitted during the International Signing Closed Period. Please contact BOC.

title: As a club / BOC, I want to create a new first year international contract
custom_steps: WHEN a Club/BOC user navigates to Intl Amateur profile
custom_expected:
THEN they can create a new contract from Player header or from Contract History.
AND If no other contracts exist for the player that are "Terms Submitted" or higher, and user hits Create New, a new contract is created with label "International First-Year" instead of Non 1st yr. Otherwise create non 1st yr
AND The contract is the same as Domestic First year except for the following differences.
- Addendum H is included in the contract. It cannot be removed and therefore has no toggle
- Addendum E also appears on the contract. It is toggled to Yes by default but can be removed/toggled no.
AND 
All other fields work the same as Domestic contracts and must be editable by user
AND If player is under 22 at time of contract creation, show parental consent. See #117960773
AND User can save contract as preliminary. This should now appear in CH (same as Domestic - red font, all appropriate columns populated correctly)
AND Include Delete function in preliminary state

custom_expected:

(1) Contract is rejected. BOC Can enter reasons for rejecting and player is taken off roster and any transactions are reversed. BOC can also delete this rejected contract
(2) Player is removed from roster on withdrawal. BOC Can delete a withdrawn Contract
(3) BOC Can enter reasons for voiding. All txs are reversed.

title: As a club, I want to be stopped if player is not passed over or drafted by my club
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a Club user
AND if amateur player's R4 status = Drafted and player was drafted in most recent draft, only the club that drafted him can create a contract
custom_steps:
THEN Business rule 3.4.1 Must be run on Create as a hard error for Clubs
AND if amateur player's R4 status = Drafted and player was drafted in most recent draft, only the club that drafted him can create a contract
AND if an amateur player has a 'passed over' R4 status, then any club can create a contract for him
custom_expected:
THEN If neither condition is met or player has a different R4 status, show error:
"You do not have permission to create a contract for this player. If you believe you have received this message in error, please contact the BOC. "

title: As club/ BOC, I want to be stopped if signing a player after the R4 signing deadline unless he is Not subject to deadline
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a Club or BOC user
custom_steps:
WHEN the Signing Date for a drafted player cannot be after 'Rule 4 Draft Signing Deadline' as set in the System Values screen, unless player is marked as Not subject to Deadline
AND on Submit if rule fails
custom_expected: THEN the error will display "You cannot submit this contract as the Signing Date is past the Rule 4 Draft Signing Deadline [value from system values]. **Hint:**Please contact the BOC"
